metadata.title: CVE-2020-25675 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: In the CropImage() and CropImageToTiles() routines ofMagickCore/transform.c, rounding calculations performed on unconstrainedpixel offsets was causing undefined behavior in the form of integeroverflow and out-of-range values as reported by UndefinedBehaviorSanitizer.Such issues could cause a negative impact to application availability orother problems related to undefined behavior, in cases where ImageMagickprocesses untrusted input data. The upstream patch introduces functionalityto constrain the pixel offsets and prevent these issues. This flaw affectsImageMagick versions prior to 7.0.9-0.

criterions.comment: imagemagick package in trusty is affected and needs fixing.
